original: A classic medieval style of shield, made of wood overlaid with leather, in an elongated teardrop shape.  Affords decent protection, but was better suited for cavalry.
translation: 一件经典的中世纪风格的木盾，被皮革覆盖，整体呈细长泪滴形。它提供了不错的防护，但更适合用于骑兵。
context:

位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/Medieval_Mod_Reborn/items/armor.json
类型为 ARMOR

https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#Medieval_Mod_Reborn→ARMOR→shield_kite
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=shield_kite

original: A convex round shield from ancient Greece, made of wood reinforced with bronze.  Heavy but effective.
translation: 一件凸起的圆盾，源自古希腊，由木头制作而成，并由青铜加固。笨重但有效。
context:

original: A longsword, made out of a very dark, almost black metal.  It seems to hold a greater edge than usual steel blades and feels …more comfortable in the hand.  While the blade is made out of this dark metal, the crossguard and the pommel seem to be made out of a brighter material, which feels abnormally cool to the touch.
translation: 一把长剑，由某种很暗几乎全黑的金属制成。似乎比普通钢刀有更大的锋利的边缘，手感……也更舒适。虽然刀刃是用黑暗金属制成的，护手和剑柄由更明亮的材料制成，其手感异常凉爽。
context:

original: A thrusting sword adopted by Ancient Rome during the conquest of the Iberian Peninsula, the "gladius hispaniensis" supplanted the hasta as the most common weapon of the Roman Legions, until the shift towards the longer spatha during the later days of the Empire.
translation: 古罗马在征服伊比利亚半岛时使用的一种刺剑，“西班牙的短剑(gladius hispaniensis)”取代了罗马长矛(Hasta)，成为罗马军团最常用的武器，直到帝国后期转为较长的罗马剑(Spatha)。

original: Little more than a small tube capable of holding a charge of gunpowder, secured to a stick.  While it has an extremely short range, it gives a powerful edge in close combat.
